removeEdge

public void removeEdge(java.util.Collection<Edge> e_list)
Remove the edges listed in e_list from the Factor Graph.
Removing an edge from f to x means:
  1. remove x to the neighbours of f
  2. remove f to the neighbours of x
  3. remove e from the edges of the Factor Graph

Parameters:
e_list - list of edges to remove

public java.lang.String toString()
